Invest in a 1kg Gold Bullion Minted Bar and add diversity to your investment portfolio with this high-quality precious metal product.

The Lux Gold Bullion Minted Bar is the apex of quality and compliance, adhering to the stringent standards set by both the Dubai Multi Commodities Centre (DMCC) and the London Bullion Market Association (LBMA). Engineered at the highest professional level in Dubai, each Lux Gold Bullion Minted Bar represents a pinnacle of craftsmanship and regulatory integrity.

The 1 Oz Lux Gold bars are the most sought-after, featuring the Lux Triangle on the reverse, designed according to the golden ratio. This symbolizes balance and perfection, echoing the bar's quality. Each bar is individually serialized and comes in a protective holder with a signed Assay Certificate, confirming its authenticity.

Why Buy Lux Gold Bullion?

Lux set itself apart by being one of the first to incorporate a scientifically-inspired design, positioning the brand as a pioneer in the bullion industry. Available in sizes from 1 gram to 1 kg, Lux Gold bars are an option for diverse investors. Payment can be made in various currencies and cryptocurrencies, offering flexibility.

Investing in Lux Gold Bars

Gold remains a reliable hedge against inflation and economic instability. Lux Gold bars, with their unique design and high purity, offer both aesthetic and investment value. Free insured storage is included for a year post-purchase.

The Lux Market has carved out a unique space in the bullion industry, attracting a broad spectrum of investors due to its innovative designs, high purity, and compliance with international standards.
